settingsDescription.desc1: Each section has up to 3 toggles (set to false/false). Only enable 1 of them, otherwise no edits will be made.
settingsDescription.desc2: multipliers apply to a value and it's %-based. 1.0 means no multiplier, 1.2 means 20% multiplier, and so on. Be aware that if initial value is negative number, higher multiplier = lower number. For example, silencer with Ergonomics of -19 with 1.2 multiplier would become -22.8
settingsDescription.desc3: absolute value simply override values. Meaning all values would be changed to it, without the regard of what it was before. For example, setting recoil absolute value to -10 will make all silencers have -10% recoil.
settingsDescription.desc4: maximum/minimum value simply override values that are above/below set number. For minimum value, if any silencer has selected stat below that, it will be bumped up to it. For maximum, it's the same but other way around. For example, setting recoil maximum value to -5 will make all silencers that have MORE than -5% recoil (for example, -2%) have -5% recoil.

velocitySection.desc1: Muzzle Velocity is almost always positive number with exception of Mosin Rifle Bramit 7.62x54R sound suppressor, so I had to make 2 multipliers, one for all silencers with muzzle velocities above 0 and one for all with velocities below 0.

accuracySection.desc1: Accuracy can be both negative and positive, so I had to make 2 multipliers, one for all silencers with accuracy above 0 and one for all with accuracy below 0.
